access_token.label: Access token
access_token.help: The access token for the TeslaMateAPI service

refresh_interval.label: Refresh interval
refresh_interval.help: In which interval the status should be pulled.

headers.label: Additonal headers
headers.help: List of additional headers. This may be useful when your TeslaMate API requires addtional headers to allow connection.

force_command_execution.label: Force command execution
force_command_execution.help: If this option is enabled, the adapter will wake up the car when it sleeps when a command was sent.
